attributes.action: Start criminal proceedings against the "scientists" involved in ClimateGate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the recent confirmation of the lies and distorted data arising from the CRU emails, PLEASE institute criminal proceedings immediately against ALL those involved in perpetuation of the AGW propaganda and lies

rejection.details: The Government does not instigate criminal proceedings.  If you believe an offence has been committed, you should go to the police.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
